mapper.sql: SELECT uuid, company_id, change_no, change_name, change_type, change_way, bill_nature, change_date, change_desc, asset_type, apply_dept, new_asset_user, apply_user, apply_date, status, period, confirm_user, confirm_date, check_user, check_date, create_by, create_name, create_time, update_by, update_name, update_time FROM finance_ft_change

if.test: params.beginChangeDate != null and params.beginChangeDate != '' and params.endChangeDate != null and params.endChangeDate != ''
params.beginPeriod != null and params.beginPeriod != '' and params.endPeriod != null and params.endPeriod != ''

mapper.select: SELECT a.uuid, a.company_id, a.change_no, a.change_name, a.change_type, a.change_way, a.bill_nature, a.change_date, a.change_desc, a.asset_type, a.apply_dept, a.new_asset_user, a.apply_user, a.apply_date, a.status, a.period, a.confirm_user, a.confirm_date, a.check_user, a.check_date, a.create_by, a.create_name, a.create_time, a.update_by, a.update_name, a.update_time, b.uuid as sub_uuid, b.company_id as sub_company_id, b.change_id as sub_change_id, b.change_no as sub_change_no, b.period as sub_period, b.change_price as sub_change_price, b.asset_id as sub_asset_id, b.asset_no as sub_asset_no, b.asset_group as sub_asset_group, b.new_asset_group as sub_new_asset_group, b.asset_name as sub_asset_name, b.new_asset_name as sub_new_asset_name, b.asset_desc as sub_asset_desc, b.asset_type as sub_asset_type, b.org_value as sub_org_value, b.get_value as sub_get_value, b.accu_depr as sub_accu_depr, b.depr_count as sub_depr_count, b.new_depr_count as sub_new_depr_count, b.dept_no as sub_dept_no, b.new_dept_no as sub_new_dept_no, b.asset_user as sub_asset_user, b.new_asset_user as sub_new_asset_user, b.user_dept as sub_user_dept, b.new_user_dept as sub_new_user_dept, b.qty as sub_qty, b.new_qty as sub_new_qty, b.unit as sub_unit, b.new_unit as sub_new_unit, b.asset_status as sub_asset_status, b.new_asset_status as sub_new_asset_status, b.location as sub_location, b.new_location as sub_new_location, b.asset_spec as sub_asset_spec, b.new_asset_spec as sub_new_asset_spec, b.contract_no as sub_contract_no, b.budget_no as sub_budget_no, b.supplyer_no as sub_supplyer_no, b.new_supplyer_no as sub_new_supplyer_no, b.manufacturer as sub_manufacturer, b.new_manufacturer as sub_new_manufacturer, b.weight as sub_weight, b.new_weight as sub_new_weight, b.capacity as sub_capacity, b.new_capacity as sub_new_capacity, b.length as sub_length, b.new_length as sub_new_length, b.building_area as sub_building_area, b.new_building_area as sub_new_building_area, b.floor_area as sub_floor_area, b.new_floor_area as sub_new_floor_area, b.layer_num as sub_layer_num, b.new_layer_num as sub_new_layer_num, b.economy_purpose as sub_economy_purpose, b.source as sub_source, b.new_source as sub_new_source, b.asset_character as sub_asset_character, b.new_asset_character as sub_new_asset_character, b.levels as sub_levels, b.new_levels as sub_new_levels, b.material_no as sub_material_no, b.location_no as sub_location_no, b.trade_no as sub_trade_no, b.card_model as sub_card_model, b.new_card_model as sub_new_card_model, b.split_type as sub_split_type, b.split_count as sub_split_count, b.source_id as sub_source_id, b.pgrm_id as sub_pgrm_id, b.create_by as sub_create_by, b.create_name as sub_create_name, b.create_time as sub_create_time, b.update_by as sub_update_by, b.update_name as sub_update_name, b.update_time as sub_update_time FROM finance_ft_change a LEFT JOIN finance_ft_change_detail b ON b.change_id = a.uuid WHERE a.uuid = #{uuid}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO finance_ft_change
uuid, company_id, change_no, change_name, change_type, change_way, bill_nature, change_date, change_desc, asset_type, apply_dept, new_asset_user, apply_user, apply_date, status, period, confirm_user, confirm_date, check_user, check_date, create_by, create_name, create_time, update_by, update_name, update_time,
#{uuid}, #{companyId}, #{changeNo}, #{changeName}, #{changeType}, #{changeWay}, #{billNature}, #{changeDate}, #{changeDesc}, #{assetType}, #{applyDept}, #{newAssetUser}, #{applyUser}, #{applyDate}, #{status}, #{period}, #{confirmUser}, #{confirmDate}, #{checkUser}, #{checkDate}, #{createBy}, #{createName}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateName}, #{updateTime},
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM finance_ft_change WHERE uuid IN
#{uuid}

DELETE FROM finance_ft_change_detail WHERE change_id IN
#{changeId}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO finance_ft_change_detail( uuid, company_id, change_id, change_no, period, change_price, asset_id, asset_no, asset_group, new_asset_group, asset_name, new_asset_name, asset_desc, asset_type, org_value, get_value, accu_depr, depr_count, new_depr_count, dept_no, new_dept_no, asset_user, new_asset_user, user_dept, new_user_dept, qty, new_qty, unit, new_unit, asset_status, new_asset_status, location, new_location, asset_spec, new_asset_spec, contract_no, budget_no, supplyer_no, new_supplyer_no, manufacturer, new_manufacturer, weight, new_weight, capacity, new_capacity, length, new_length, building_area, new_building_area, floor_area, new_floor_area, layer_num, new_layer_num, economy_purpose, source, new_source, asset_character, new_asset_character, levels, new_levels, material_no, location_no, trade_no, card_model, new_card_model, split_type, split_count, source_id, pgrm_id, create_by, create_name, create_time, update_by, update_name, update_time) VALUES
( #{item.uuid}, #{item.companyId}, #{item.changeId}, #{item.changeNo}, #{item.period}, #{item.changePrice}, #{item.assetId}, #{item.assetNo}, #{item.assetGroup}, #{item.newAssetGroup}, #{item.assetName}, #{item.newAssetName}, #{item.assetDesc}, #{item.assetType}, #{item.orgValue}, #{item.getValue}, #{item.accuDepr}, #{item.deprCount}, #{item.newDeprCount}, #{item.deptNo}, #{item.newDeptNo}, #{item.assetUser}, #{item.newAssetUser}, #{item.userDept}, #{item.newUserDept}, #{item.qty}, #{item.newQty}, #{item.unit}, #{item.newUnit}, #{item.assetStatus}, #{item.newAssetStatus}, #{item.location}, #{item.newLocation}, #{item.assetSpec}, #{item.newAssetSpec}, #{item.contractNo}, #{item.budgetNo}, #{item.supplyerNo}, #{item.newSupplyerNo}, #{item.manufacturer}, #{item.newManufacturer}, #{item.weight}, #{item.newWeight}, #{item.capacity}, #{item.newCapacity}, #{item.length}, #{item.newLength}, #{item.buildingArea}, #{item.newBuildingArea}, #{item.floorArea}, #{item.newFloorArea}, #{item.layerNum}, #{item.newLayerNum}, #{item.economyPurpose}, #{item.source}, #{item.newSource}, #{item.assetCharacter}, #{item.newAssetCharacter}, #{item.levels}, #{item.newLevels}, #{item.materialNo}, #{item.locationNo}, #{item.tradeNo}, #{item.cardModel}, #{item.newCardModel}, #{item.splitType}, #{item.splitCount}, #{item.sourceId}, #{item.pgrmId}, #{item.createBy}, #{item.createName}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.updateBy}, #{item.updateName}, #{item.updateTime})
